text: @JustinTrudeau #CanadaHomeworkHelp I have a math question:  if my RDSP has lost half it’s value during covid19, can you extend federal RDSP contributions until age 59, instead of 49, so I have a chance to build it back up again.  I am disabled and need some help, PLEASE.
